characteristics.climate: Tropical, with a distinct wet and dry season
characteristics.precipitation: Seasonal, with heavy rains in the wet season
elements: Fire Dancing harbinger of warmth and destruction, the embodiment of passion.
Earth Immovable foundation, embodying strength and permanence.
Wood Silent witness of time, carrier of life's cycle of growth and decay.
Water Flowing lifeblood of the world, master of adaptation and change.
Sunstone Stone of joy, the light inspirer, and the harnesser of the sun's energy.
Jade Stone of harmony, longevity, and nurturing energy.
Air Invisible force of life, carrier of whispers and secrets.
